Bonjour!

My name is Jerry (I don't know where Tom is!😉) I'm a fullstack web developer living in Paris. I have always been attracted to new technologies. I graduated from a business school, and I subsequently worked for many companies, before professionalizing myself in web development.

My main purpose today is to build user-friendly digital experiences for a variety of clients.
Feel free to contact me if you have any inquiry or any exciting project!
